Title: Evacuation Area
Description:
Look, you can blow up my life's work if it is our only choice, but I will not put my workers in danger.

This was the path we all chose, but I won't have them sacrifice themselves to fire or nerubians for it. Tell them that I said they need to get out of here immediately. 

And if a single one of them gets so much as chipped, the Council will have a lot to answer for!
CompletionText: If my workers cannot be kept safe, I am putting a stop to this plan.
RewardText: I am glad to hear they had the sense to clear out without much of a fuss.
